key_title: Key to the species of Hybanthus

source.author: Entwisle, T.J.
source.title: Hybanthus
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Entwisle, T.J. (1996). Hybanthus. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Inflorescence 2.5–20 cm long and far exceeding the leaves, or flowers solitary; lower petal 7–20 mm long; leaf-lamina to 9 cm long; eastern Victoria
Inflorescence up to 2 cm long, usually barely exceeding the leaves (flowers sometimes solitary); lower petal 4–8 mm long; leaf lamina to 3.5 cm long; north-western and north-central Victoria
Flowers in raceme; leaf-lamina to 9 cm long; mostly montane
Flowers solitary; leaf-lamina to 4.5 cm long; coastal heaths and damp depressions
